## QCA models
```{r,echo=FALSE}
m1=data.frame(
  stringsAsFactors = FALSE,
              Type = c("Condition","Condition",
                       "Condition","Condition","Condition","Condition",
                       "Condition","Condition","Condition","Outcome"),
          Variable = c("formal_lim","sub_lim",
                       "sig_thresh","ref","practice","reform_leg","admis_timing",
                       "inst_disc","dem_qual","admis_y"),
             Label = c("Formal limits",
                       "Substantive limits","Signature thresholds","Referendum availability",
                       "Initiative practice","Reform legislation",
                       "Timing of admissibility","Institutional discretion",
                       "Democratic quality","Admissibility outcomes"),
       Description = c("A combined metric measuring all aspects of formal limits (limits, checks, remedies etc)",
                       "A combined metric measuring all aspects of substantive limits (limits, checks, remedies etc)",
                       "A combined metric measuring aspects of the signature gathering process, which could be high thresholds versus lower ones",
                       "Whether a referendum is possible (ie distinguishing agenda from citizen-initiated referendums)",
                       "A metric measuring the degree of practice, number of submissions",
                       "A variable measuring whether the initiative has undergone reform",
                       "A variable dealing with the timing model, pre, post etc.",
                       "A variable measuring degree of institutional discretion (role of courts versus politics)",
                       "A metric measuring democratic quality",
                       "The type of admissibility outcomes; presumably a multi-value variable, low to high rates of admissibility")
)

m1 %>% 
  kbl() %>% 
  kable_styling(full_width = F,position = "left",
                bootstrap_options = c("striped", "hover"))
    
```
